content:
ThemedScrollbarWindow Struct

Definition

Represents a window and a value that indicates how its scrollbars should be themed when displayed in the Visual Studio designer.

In this Article

public struct ThemedScrollbarWindow
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
ThemedScrollbarWindow

Fields

Handle

The window handle.

public IntPtr Handle;

Mode

A value that indicates how the window scrollbars should be themed when displayed in the Visual Studio designer.

public System.Windows.Forms.Design.ThemedScrollbarMode Mode;
